name: Karate Kid Quiz | DC Comics | 10 Questions

questions.text: What is Karate Kid's real name?
questions.explanation:
Val Armorr.

	Val Armorr's father was a notorious criminal. Val's mother tried to hide him from hs father, but she was killed and Val was found.

questions.text: Who raised the young Karate Kid?
questions.explanation:
Toshiaki White Crane.

	Toshiaki White Crane was Japan's greatest hero, and killed Val's father. Raising Val as his own son and training him in martial arts, White Crane served as Val's mentor.

questions.text: Karate Kid joined the Legion when the group was preparing to fend off an attack from which alien race?
questions.explanation:
The Khunds.

	The Khunds are noted for their frequent use of violence, and resemble humans. However, they are much taller and have hot pink skin. Nemesis Kid was working for the Khunds and nearly framed Karate Kid for his treachery, but the plot was discovered.

Princess Projectra.

	To prove his worthiness, Val spent an entire year in the relatively primitive 20th century. Upon his return, Projectra became the ruler of her homeplanet, and both resigned from the Legion.

Nemesis Kid.

	Nemesis Kid led a group of villains who kidnapped a number of the Legionnaires, among them Karate Kid and his wife Princess Projectra. Upon escaping, Karate Kid was mortally wounded in one-on-one combat with Nemesis Kid. He used his last breaths to destroy the power sources of the strange machines that were moving Orando toward destruction.

questions.text: As with many comic book characters, death did not last forever for Karate Kid. When discovered in the seventh issue of the second volume of "Justice League of America", what name did Karate Kid go by?
questions.explanation:
Trident.

	Karate Kid fights and defeats Black Lightning easily, and engages Batman in combat. Batman notes that while he is a class 12 fighter, Karate Kid is at level 15.

questions.text: When Superboy was under a magic spell that controlled his mind, Karate Kid was able to incapacitate him for a while. Which kind of muscle lock did Karate Kid use?
questions.explanation:
Klenarian.

	Although Superboy was starting to work his way out of the muscle lock, Karate Kid was able to hold him until the spell wore off. Karate Kid asked Saturn Girl and Lightning Lad to help him, but the spell wore off before they could be of assistance.

questions.text: Karate Kid knew the weakest spot of any object.
questions.explanation:
True.

	This helped Karate Kid shatter rocks and break metal with just one blow. Another example of this ability is when Green Arrow had to hit the weakest spot of a diamond in order to free the Justice League.

questions.text: When he applied for membership in the Legion, Karate Kid split a steel beam with one blow. What did he then do?
options: Challenged Ferro Lad to a fight
Knocked out the other three applicants
questions.explanation:
Challenged Superboy to a fight.

	With his patented 'Super Karate', Karate Kid was able to hold his own against Superboy, even throwing the Boy of Steel off guard! Karate Kid's original incarnation was especially tenacious and exceedingly brave.

questions.text: Which intergalactic threat did Karate Kid kick in the face?
questions.explanation:
Darkseid.

	Darkseid hails from Apokolips, and is one of Superman's biggest threats. Searching for the Anti-Life Equation, he is fated to face his son Orion and be defeated by him.
